title: Where is the Wrightsville Beach mailbox where people leave notes, letters and secrets?
text: Hello. It recently moved. Thanks to the Lumina News, here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.luminanews.com/article.asp?aid=9098&iid=293&sud=30 You can park at beach access 2 and walk north along the dunes. Here's a map of access points: http://www.townofwrightsvillebeach.com/Portals/0/BeachAccess.pdf
